top_negative.sent: Commodity Prices, Availability and General Risk Conditions Commodity price risk represents our primary market risk, generated by our purchases of green coffee and dairy products, among other items.

Quantitative and Qualitative Disclosures About Market Risk There has been no material change in the commodity price risk, foreign currency exchange risk, equity security price risk or interest rate risk discussed in Item 7A of the 10-K.
Commodity Prices, Availability and General Risk Conditions Commodity price risk represents our primary market risk, generated by our purchases of green coffee and dairy products, among other items.
